_header: That that is sweet in thy mum
Note:
Cf. Watson (1867)
XWatson, Thomas. Proverbs and Epigrams of John Heywood (A.D. 1562). Manchester: for the Spenser Society, 1867.

BodDou52.Transcription: That at is swete in thy mummegeue thy felawe summe
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 52.

RylandsLat394.Transcription:
That that is swete in þy monneȜefe þi felowȝ
                    þerof somme
RylandsLat394.Note:
Translating Da pertem socio quod sapit ora tup, which
                    follows.
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 102.
